channel.title: Storm Riders! (3 Sessions)
channel.description:
![](/uploads/default/original/1X/811b3d6d55668c341ef5248cd13516ed0465dfb7.jpeg)
Remember all the fun you had as a child mashing your action figures and dolls together, speaking in funny voices, and tying your toy laser pistol to your cat? Waking up early, sitting cross-legged too closely to the TV set, a bowl of sugary cereal in your lap, drinking in the glare of the television reflecting in your hungry eyes...Storm Riders! is about portraying the weird and wild characters of those cartoons and appealing to the people who love them.
This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
NOTE: Each session will have a "star" character who will get a bit more focus and screen time than the others. Since there will be four players but only three sessions someone will miss out on this "star" treatment.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
